name: Jaki's Wacky Adventure
description:
JWA is an action packed diverse open-world 2.5D action-adventure RPG. Play as Jaki, a powerful & clever ninja fox. Wield your shuriken with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire, avoid lethal hazards & defeat clever enemies. The farther North you travel, the more deadly & crafty your enemies become. Craft powerful potions to improve your odds of survival. Help the local residents – maybe a troll with a pink sock or a yogi with a goat named Nibbler. There is always something quirky, challenging & fun to do in Harmony Haven!

Harmony Haven is full of surprises & Easter eggs for you to discover. Branched dialogue & optional side quests provide interesting choices as you explore strange lands. Start in Eureka, a town full of scientists. Travel to Toon-Town where your skills as a CSI are needed to catch a killer. If you are brave enough, head North to Chillgrave Keep where you match wits with a clever boss.

Can you become the most powerful ninja in the land? Beat your best score to find out.

Game Features


Solve Puzzles, Explore Hidden Areas
Oh No! You fell through a magical portal & now you are trapped.
Are you clever enough to escape?


Battle Bugs, Beasts & Robots to Become the Best Ninja in the Land!
On your journey, encounter numerous powerful & tricky enemies. Wield unique shuriken with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire, avoid lethal hazards & improve your ninja skills. Can you beat your best score & become the best ninja in the land?




Discover Rare Items & Improve Your Skills
Explore hidden areas & discover valuable rare items that level up your skills.


Craft powerful potions!
Collect plants & powerful crystals. Apply crafted potions to ninja stars to increase damage or freeze enemies. Health potions restore health or make you invincible.


Meet interesting characters!
Along your journey, you meet interesting characters. Meet eccentric scientists, like Einstein in Eureka. Or, meet cute lovable characters in Toon Town. Choose to help them with their problems and receive valuable resources which improve your chances of success.


Explore Strange Lands
Many adventures, challenges, and quests await Jaki in the open world of Harmony Haven.


Manage Your Resources
You may buy & sell resources IF you can stand Y-Lee Weasel's prices. Or collect and craft items that improve your skills, enhance your health, or increase damage. Some powerful potions are rare, so use them strategically.
